record.jsxtip: Fires after the user clicks this image button or after an equivalent event.

record.jsxtext: the object that publishes this event.
the browser event that triggers this event.

record.jsxtip: Fires when the user changes the state of this image button. Canceling this event prevents the change of state.

record.jsxtext: the object that publishes this event.
the browser event that triggers this event.
the new state if not vetoed.

record.jsxtip: Fires after the user right-clicks this image button and before the bound context menu displays. Canceling this event prevents the menu from displaying.

record.jsxtext: the object that publishes this event.
the browser event that triggers this event.

record.jsxreturntext: use this field to override the default menu with an instance of jsx3.gui.Menu.

record.jsxtip: Fires after this image button is removed from the DOM.

record.jsxtext: the object that publishes this event.
the parent of this image button before it is removed from the DOM.
